comments: Lots of fun. Unfortunately, the other day I had to do a factory reset on my phone. When I installed Design Home afterwards, all of my designs, progress...all of the money I've spent on the game for over a year was/ is gone. It created a totally different designer number (profile) for me. It wasn't connected to my Facebook for privacy reasons, but now? I don't know if I can keep playing, if I have to start all the way over. If you want to play, you'd better link it to Facebook.

This is an awesome game.  Especially since I love decorating.   Few things though,  how about pillows on the plain sofas, modern pictures for modern furniture,  traditional scones, etc, for traditional designs, and more diamonds or stop using extra sofas and expenses that take away our diamonds. We need more accessories for the tables like books, vases, and flowers, also how about some better pictures because your choices are by far not worth $1000.00.  Last but not least, more colors in furniture with two or three toned designs.  That's what designers look for.  Thank you! Still love the game.

The game is addictive. I wish that we could see who we are up against in the voting to better understand the rating we receive. It would be great if we had the chance to buy limited accessories 1 more time. I love the new challenges that we have received in the last few weeks. I've noticed every time you make an update that I have lost some furniture why? I do not like that you have increased the dollar value of buying the highest amount of gems. I won't buy again. Losing intrerest real fast.   Thanks again.

I super loved this game and I am glad tapjoy is back.  I just have an issue lately.  I completed an offer lately but never got rewarded.  It says it might take 24 hours for the submit button to appear so I can contact customer support but it's been 3 days now and it still says pending.  I have no other way to report it.  Please look into this. Voting is an issue but it's the players who are voting and they vote for whatever they think has a better design no matter if they follow the requirements, you can only use a furniture for a limited time and will have to purchase it again if you want it.  I understand those things but I hope the reward for every design completed is higher than 500 so we''ll have more to spend and make the furniture more affordable.  Otherwise, this app is one of the best!

I love this game concept. I also like the "borrow" option but I don't have anyone to borrow from because everyone I know stops playing because it's too difficult to advance (achieve 5 stars, which is the quickest and nearly impossible way to do so. Impossible because your advancement is based on user preference). A "sort by price" filter would also be cool for those of us who enjoy this game but are on a limited budget.

I wish rating took into account the design assignment. People design completely different styles than the description and as long as they design in black and white or a neutral palette it will win votes over a design that is actually following the instructions. Contemporary design beats Mediterranean or Eclectic every time. There's no point in even entering those contests because people who do a contemporary design will cancel your design out.

comments: I originally gave a 4 star buy now I am dropping the stars to 1. I have the cloud backup and after 1 day of playing everything was erased and I loss all my progress. Why have a cloud save or play the game or spend moo pney when it's erased. I still love the game but now frustrated I will think about uninstalling.

The puzzles are interesting, the animations are generally enjoyable. It quickly becomes a grind, though, where you aren't enjoying the gameplay, you're just trying to get past the timewasters of the daily challenge, or fighting the arbitrary points of the arena. The clan battles and Mighty Eagle challenge are the best parts, but you can't play them all the time. You have to grind away in the Arena.

I just purchased a new phone. And being I'm using the same e-mail address i would have thought it would have started me at the same level I had been on prior to the new phone. Kinda sucks because i had spent a near fortune and was at level 64 ! Unless they can fix this I will remove the game for good. I mean I had every hat except the ones that cost 25,000. Now I'm at zero!

RESUBMITTED: Arena games were sucked up by those high-card players or maybe cheaters. My power cards are the same, just like my opponent, or higher than my opponent's cards. When I slinging those piggies or blocks, it gives me lower points like 4 hundred thousand. But if my opponent slinging them all, it gives higher points like 7.5 million. I lost my winning streaks so I had to play again but it gives me same points so I lost again, sadly. I thought your arena games are really much fun, but they're not.

GAH! They've over complicated this game with unnecessary graphics and gifts and prizes etc. I couldn't even figure out how to get into the levels for a while haha. I'm sure if I had the patience to go through and understand it properly it would be fine, but I didn't want to. Old angry birds setup was better. Wish you didn't change it. Uninstalled after 1 day.

Classic gameply bogged down by aggravating fremium distration. Havent run into any energy bars yet and already on second world. New birds add interesting gameplay elements but spells are an automatic win that add no semse of achievement besides skipping a hard level. If you want some classic angry birds but dont mind clicking through to get to it then give this a download.

Plus, destroy blocks to fill up the Destruct-O-Meter and earn extra birds!NEW MULTI-STAGE LEVELS!You‚Äôve never seen Piggy Island like this ‚Äì jaw-droppingly stunning levels brimming with exotic plants, quirky details and plenty of peril. And because those naughty porkies are building their teetering towers right under your beak, many levels have multiple stages. Uh oh.SPECTACULAR SPELLS!Blizzards, Hot Chilis, Golden Ducks and other outrageous spells give you an added advantage against those swindling swine. descriptionHTML:
Join hundreds of millions of players for FREE and start your Angry Birds slingshot adventure now! Team up with your friends, gather in clans and take on challenges and events in the all new game modes. Are you ready to evolve your birds and show your skills in the most daring Angry Birds game out there?

CHOOSE YOUR BIRD!
It’s the ultimate slingshot strategy – YOU choose which bird to fling next! “But that makes it easier, right?” WRONG! You’ll need to choose wisely if you’re going to stop those eggs from getting scrambled. Plus, destroy blocks to fill up the Destruct-O-Meter and earn extra birds!

NEW MULTI-STAGE LEVELS!
You’ve never seen Piggy Island like this – jaw-droppingly stunning levels brimming with exotic plants, quirky details and plenty of peril. And because those naughty porkies are building their teetering towers right under your beak, many levels have multiple stages. Uh oh.

SPECTACULAR SPELLS!
Blizzards, Hot Chilis, Golden Ducks and other outrageous spells give you an added advantage against those swindling swine. And when you need some serious help, guess who’s at hand to make a pork-smashing cameo? That’s right, it’s the sardine loving Mighty Eagle. Oh yeah!

CHALLENGE OTHER PLAYERS!
Challenge players from across the world in the Arena to see who’s the most hardcore bird flinger of them all. Play new tournaments every day, earn feathers to level up your birds and face off against the toughest competition on the planet. Game face!

DEFEAT BOSS PIGGIES!
There’s some serious bad guys on Piggy Island, and your slingshot skills are needed to take them down. Foreman Pig, Chef Pig and the infamous King Pig will stop at nothing to keep your eggs. Are you gonna let ‘em get away with that? It’s time to teach the pork a lesson.

-----------------------------

comments: EA please keep improving, i already in love playing this game until i realized that i had to spend a lot amount of money to upgrade my team and collecting great cards.. actually im not feeling good at this because i'm not a rich guy that could paid all those packs with very high price.. im saying this to represent all f2p players out there, although im not so f2p at all. i only spent a dollar to buy that eoe pass and nothing again until now. so please, give a chance for f2p player to keep playing this game with no jealousy with those high overall p2p players.. thanks

Be careful on this game, its possible to spend real money and get absolutely nothing in return! For example I bought a Saint Patrick pack, 1000 gems a pack and got 10 lucky leafs, I could use the lucky to buy another pack, which I got a lucky leafs from, so I spent 10 lucky leafs got 1 lucky leaf that I couldnt use  unless I brought more! Literally got nothing for my money. This is EAs way of mugging people.

Please add more sounds effect on this game, and fix the sfx that already on this app. I hope you add full match online like the other game (90 minutes) so we just not attack but defends too. Replay button must be great, and i have idea that you guys add event like "best goal of the week" or so, from that replay, we can save, and send to you, and you can choose who will win it. I think it will make people playing this game. Commentator should be great too if you add full match versus online. I love this game, please read it. Egy Maulana V plays for Lechia Gda≈Ñsk now. Add it! Add to all of your fifa games. That replay button should be great

I just saved up all my team hero points, watched a heap of ads so I could build up stamina so I could do my best to try to get Man√© in team heroes. About half way through collecting my hero rewards, the rewards pages started to go blank, and the last 25 packs I opened were empty. Is there any way to correct this?

The game is good but it could be better. Elite players are too expensive  so it's hard to upgrade team. Informs and special cards are all untradable so unless you get lucky in events you won't get a chance to play with them. The new layout is better though. Unless you have plenty of time or money don't expect to progress in this game all that quickly. Mobile games should not be as grindy as console games.

What's wrong with this game. I was playing Vs mode and was in world class level and got more then 600000 fans.and now I saw I'm in pro level.how it could be automaticy.fix it pls what the hell is going on.i make my progress playing v hard and all gone with in movement.even I did not play and lose.

Even after New update this game still won't work! I can't believe you guys have this many downloads and people spending real money, but you can't figure out how to make the game work. I can't play for more than 2 minutes without it freezing. Fix the game or give refunds.

comments: Most missions are 1 to 8 hours long leaving you bored and playing other games. Want to do ANYTHING, it'll take real money but gives you nothing in return. Now events keep expanding and back to back. Only way to advance is money. Went from pay to play to cash cow. They have terrible customer service and just ignore emails and they rigged the game so some missions you have to buy things with real money. And they actually punish good players and there is zero recourse.

It is an entertaining game. The latest update won't let me play the game. It states there's an error with the map and to reload again. 24hrs now and I still can't play it. Also very very jumpy and takes a  good few minutes before it takes action and that was before this update. It looks cool and is more interactive but so much slower and frustrating.  Otherwise it would be PRIMO. Just not quite there yet.

My first game glitched and didn't load the free black widow quest, or the black panther event at level six. Be careful about buying buildings you don't need yet, I had no way to buy Club A and had to start over.

Too expensive at times to get the best rewards and all the goals. Love the concept and game play. Some adventures take a bit long.  Used to love this game. Have spent a fortune on it. Since the upgrade hate the gameplay....not that I can play anymore. Since the hulk event the game comes up and then crashes.  Give me my thousands of dollars and hours of time back, since it's now useless to me.

After recent update game is not starting. As it is not working just uninstalled. Installed game as new event has started. I thought developers sorted out the issue. But after starting the game it downloads around 500mb data and stopped working. Wow what a beautiful new event.after new update & bug fix still game not opening.23 March still app is not working.

So, a lot of problems have been fixed and now it's actually enjoyable and fun to play again. Thank you very much. Just a thing left to change, please lower the price for Ranking a character to 5, 20000 credits are hard to get, maybe 10000, or 15000 as well. üòÄ

comments: I'm honestly about to uninstall. I've been playing 3 days and it's making it impossible to complete the daily task. I can't even invite friends... Edit: it won't allow me to invite friends, I'm able to play one game a day unless I continuously buy more tokens...but with ads after every game, they get funding from them. I installed this game because the reviews were the best, but maybe it's just got a grudge against me!

I understand they are trying to make money off this app, but if you are going to charge someone 320 tickets to play 4 cards, the reward should be more than 70 tickets per win.  I mean, really?! Some people want to play bingo, but want something to work toward without being bored.  I played Bingo story and deleted it, because I had a lot of credits, but EVERY BOARD WAS THE SAME.  Also, the powerups in this game should be limited to what you have available, and not have to purchase because you are out of said power up.  It might make more people play if they are rewarded.  .  I mean the quests saying you will win 600 tickets if you complete the quest, but you're spending on the normal side 280+ tickets, really?  And no other options besides watching ad videos for free credits?  And I'm not saying to add a "download this app and run it for 3 tickets.  Reach level 300 for 40 tickets."  Rant over

Everything would be pretty neat, but there should be another way to get more tickets. I've been stuck at the New York state for several days now, cause I can only replay the first stages with the tickets from the daily bonus.
Love it. The only reason I didn't give 5's across the board is it gets costly per game as you gain levels. The games are way fun and you can play up to 8 cards !!!!!

There should be more ways to get or win more tickets and power-ups. I also think the costs per cards increases too much from board to board. Other than those two issues, I love this game. Would play more if there were other ways to get/win tickets, the purchase costs is ridiculous for the middle/working-class.  I'd rather pay my bills than buy fake in-game tickets that CAN'T win me REAL CASH. Thank you keep up the good work.
It's a fun game. You have to be quick near the end beacause the game seem to end while the caller is still calling the last number. You don't get a penalty for daubing the wrong number.

comments: Cannot get in touch with support. When Pennypop ran the game, they were very helpful and easy to get ahold of. Now I can't reach anyone and my account is in limbo (even after having been a dedicated player years ago). Be warned, it's not the game it was and until it steps up on customer service, I wouldn't put any money into it.

Tried reinstalling on a new device and it couldn't connect to facebook. Couldn't recognize my email (even though I get emails from them). Kept trying to get me to make a new account. I'm sorry, but when I play something off and on for roughly half a decade, then I'd like for the app to work so I can retrieve my account. Fix it, and I'll change my review because I really do love this game.

I'll give this game a higher rating only if the game support will release my epic monster, which is permanently locked for mission at the dig site. A glitch that they fail to do anything. No response, no support.

I'm revising my review.. I use to love this game. Now it's becoming more like a pain in my behind to even play. The game is not allowing me to do normal things that I'm suppose to be able to do. It's really making me angry!
I really love the hell out of this game.. Those haters who say its slow its not.. your phone is. your CPU is tacy as F plz don't blame the game..

Takes 2 mins to load then you have to press "try again" 20 times then wait for 2 mins and repeat everything 100x before it can load then just after you beat a boss you have to press try again 100x then it crashes. Best game ever.

comments: Screenshots made this game look amazing. But then i loaded this up, and didn't even want to finish the tutorial, (which felt never-ending) because I realized this an exact copy of Hobbits Kingdoms, which I stopped because there was never any actual battles, or  motion graphics. And all of those cool CGi characters don't play as shown in the screenshots. Deleted.

In short this is the perfect pocket game. Strategy meets battles and bloodshed. You can play the game how you like, its not like clash of clans where your forced to be hostile, and it gives you a good start. Honestly, i dont understand why people dont like this game however all the bad reports seemed to be from players of the old game....

Love the game. I've been playing since the realeasd of the game before it became Elves Vs Dwarves. They have done an amazing job with this game. Some things could have been better like a majority of my inventory resetting when i rejoined after the game was bought. But overall a wonderful game either way.

Terrible game. In the original hobbit I was an original world 42, back in dec 2012.  Fully maxed 5 cities 100 billion might every hero in every city was min 250 some were 280. Not to mention had couple hundred mithril left in my account Plus 10s of thousands of troops to unbox.. when i went to update game the merged 6 new worlds and im back to level 1.. lmao stupid move on your end. Loyal player here now gone! Was an awesome game i loved it super fun now... seems to be a joke. Duces

It's ok.. I wish they wouldn't have changed the Hobbit into this. It was a good game but I can't get into it now that they changed everything, I guess they "stole" or used the Lord of the rings without permission, probably copyright issues so they changed everything.. Now it's pretty lame..

In server 179 one player might still 640m his troops still not cleared he still no 1 in might rank as he is a small player name . latrobio  of NOTORIOUS alliance please fix this. All others T5 troops cleared.he have lots of illigal troops of T5

Lead legendary heroes in a battle to defeat the forces of evil! Join Millions of players online to build your Elf or Dwarf Kingdom and rule the lands!
►►►Over 20 million players and counting◄◄◄
 
The battle has only just begun! PLAY FOR FREE and join millions worldwide to drive evil from the lands! Gather friends to form powerful Alliances and make your way to the top of the leaderboards. Play as an Elf or Dwarf as you join heroes to build your empire and dominate the realm.
 
SUMMON LEGENDARY HEROES
• Appoint heroes to lead your troops in battle
 
AMASS A POWERFUL ARMY
• Join the Elves or Dwarves and train vast armies to rule the realm
 
BUILD A MIGHTY FELLOWSHIP
• Connect with fellow players in real-time to build a powerful Alliance to crush the competition
 
CONQUER CAMPAIGN MODE
Adventure through epic quests to defeat fearsome bosses
 
RULE YOUR KINGDOM ON-THE-GO
• Strategize against opponents as you bring your realm with you on your mobile device
 

 
**************Important***********
Note: A network connection is required to play
Works with iPhone 3GS+, iPod touch 3rd & later, and all iPads
Requires iOS 5.0 or later

comments: I love this game so much... It's just that I hate how long it takes to get story tickets. Four hours for one ticket is definitely too long, especially since some of the chapters are really short, and it makes me sometimes forget that I even want to play the game. I love the storyline, but I wish there were a little more choices that she can make, because it mostly feels like I'm just watching everything unfold instead of being able to choose whether I want to go somewhere with someone or not. Other than that, I really do love the game, it's so addicting and beautiful, especially with the contrast in the characters.

TLDR; This isn't suited for teens. It's more suited for adults.   People are saying it's boring, but it's actually not. It's dependent on age group. I'm 26, too old to enjoy drama. In this romance, your character is an adult working a job, focusing on herself primarily, and thinking of love second. It is good for people who are past the excitement of dating and are more interested in a casual story with love development. The characters are respectful of your boundaries, which is something you learn to like when you've matured. If you want characters that throw themselves on you, this will indeed be boring for you. :)

I started with the FB version of it and absolutely loved it. Love the characters and the story line. Pretty consistent quality, though some stories and characters are written better than others. Comparing to the other games their checkpoints are bit more tough (little more expensive for premium) but it's still worth it.

I absolutely adore this game and all of the Shall We Date? games I've played. My only problem with this game, and several others, are the free diamonds. The options for free coins are mostly only in the lower double digits and the conversion rate is 10 points to one diamond so it's very hard to earn them and I'd be able to play and enjoy more if it was a one to one conversion rate.

I play three NTT Solmare Shall We Date games - and by far, I like this one the best. I've even run through all the different "tangles." With this newest set, Moses and Ike, I shockingly finished during Super Early Bird and can't wait to make my next pick!

One of my favourite Shall We Date games, and I've played a lot of them. The entire story isn't so long (like wizardess heart) and the plot isn't just drama. It's refreshing. It keeps you hooked and there's also a strong independent MC! However, getting enough diamonds to get a premium route is so hard! I've been playing for almost 3 months but I have no way come close to 140 diamonds to pass the last checkpoint. And the only time I use diamonds is the first checkpoint for the "body".

descriptionHTML:
Complete the prologue before Feb. 28, 11:00 PM (PDT) and get some useful items!
Don't miss the starter SALE to get special avatar items for FREE!! until Feb. 28, 11:00 PM (PDT).

“Would you be my better half?”
A sparkling and heart-pounding romance is about to begin! Once entering the luxurious apartment which becomes your new residence, you gradually find yourself being trapped into a love triangle with high-profile men. Who will be your beloved one to fulfill your dream and complete your life? This is the otome game that delivers you the most stunning, inspirational love story!

About Story:
You are a credited scientist and researcher of wildlife conservation in Kaleido City. Your story begins when you move in to the luxurious apartment called Lilac Court, where many celebrities reside, as you take a position in the new workplace, Kaleido National Animal Institute, to save endangered species. Once you move in, you get to know many handsome and mature residents. Then, two men get close to you and begin to fight over your heart. As your heart wavers, you’ll make a decision to choose one, whom you can chase your dreams together with. Untangle the bittersweet knot of a love triangle, and find your best man!

Attractive men you’ll fall in love with:
●Ryan Gray “I want you next to me. I want us to be together.”
This charismatic bartender works in the palatial hotel’s bar. He approaches you in a princely, sociable manner, but he sometimes behaves playfully to tease the girl he deeply loves. He seems to have a true dream underneath his gentlemanly smile. He is an elder brother of Cody.
●Cody Gray “I won’t let anyone take you away from me.”
This famed, ambitious actor became excessively successful in the city. He is optimistic and slightly prideful, but very passionate towards acting. He sometimes shows a little shyness to the girl he is fascinated by. He is a younger brother of Ryan.
●Miguel Hernandez “I want to stay with you and watch you smile.”
This hottest athlete is a professional swimmer who’ve won a gold medal before. Being a gold medalist, he is considered as a hero by the people in the city. He is calm and considerate to others while being stoic to himself. It seems he is hiding something with his gentle smile. Nolan is his best friend.
●Nolan A. Zarek, Jr. “Be more confident, because you are the one I chose.”
The highly recognized, elite lawyer of the city is such a smart, diplomatic, and diligent man. He is sarcastic with a sharp tongue, but his true heart is caring and attentive. He seems to have some kind of complex. Miguel has been his best friend for a long time.

Main Features:
●FREE TO PLAY!
●Landscape display and beautifully illustrated graphics take you to the lifelike swooning otome world!
●Multiple episodes and endings for each male character! Win the ultimate story by choosing the best choice of actions!
●The gorgeous fashion coordinating avatar experience awaits you! Do you like cute, sexy, sporty, or elegant fashion styles? Find your boyfriend’s favorite trend, dress in the perfect matching outfit with him, and nail your fashion!
●Extra mini-games to enjoy and flourish your main love romance! Pop’n Sweet Café, the cooking game offers you lots of reward stories, and Gacha-Slot games bring you many premier prizes! All of these will definitely maximize your romantic voltage level!
●Many seasonal events offer you many sweet episodes to boost the intimacy level between you and your better half! Get exclusive event stories, premium photos, and adorable avatar items to enrich the gameplay!

Download: http://shallwedate.jp/lt
Official trailer: https://youtu.be/z1TzN3K-FAw
Official website: http://shallwedate.jp/en/
Official Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/ShallWeDate.NTTSolmare
About NTT Solmare Corporation:
We are a Japanese game production company, focusing to bring Japanese visual novel dating simulations, and otome games to the world!

descriptionHTML:
EPIC STRATEGY. HEROIC PROPORTIONS.

Meet your enemies on the battlefield, and put your tactics to the test. Recruit, train and build your army to battle and conquer every opponent in this turn-based strategy game.

Collect and recruit dozens of units to turn your regiments from a handful of militia into a steeled fighting force. Equip and customize each unit, develop weapons and armor, and master game-changing abilities.

Compete in intense PVP battles against the Warlords of Aternum community and climb to the top of the leaderboards. Do you have what it takes to become a true Warlord?

JOIN THE FIGHT
Take on the orc horde, roaming bandits and fellow warlords in intense turn-based PvE or PvP battles

YOUR MOVE, YOUR VICTORY
Make the right tactical decisions to dominate intense 3D animated combat on the hexagonal battlefield

UNITE THE LAND
Build your army from the ground up and forge powerful alliances

EQUIP YOUR TROOPS
Discover legendary weapons, and unlock tide-turning special abilities

DEFEND YOUR HOME
March through dozens of shires and explore the fantasy land of Dunmar

DESTROY YOUR ENEMIES
Hoist your banner at the top of the PVP leaderboards


Warlords of Aternum is free to download and play, but it also allows you to purchase virtual items with real money inside the game. You can disable in-app purchases in your device’s settings.

Warlords of Aternum requires internet access to play and access its social features. Warlords of Aternum may also contain advertising.

Are you ready to join the fight?

recentChanges: ABORT EXPEDITION
As this has been requested by a lot of players, you can now choose to cancel any running expedition in the Sky Arch to gain access to all your regiments when needed.
Note that if you cancel an expedition, you will get no rewards for it.
PUSH NOTIFICATIONS
We have added new push notifications for meaningful game events like a free chest waiting to get picked up. Make sure you have push notifications turned on for Warlords of Aternum.
summary: Put your tactics to the test in an epic fantasy universe
title: Warlords of Aternum

description: Run to chase after the robber and explore the endless running worlds of Talking Tom Gold Run! Whether you‚Äôre a kid, or just young at heart, this cool game will have you running, jumping, and getting an EPIC ADRENALINE RUSH IN NO TIME AT ALL! ‚òÖ Get a rush as you run through the subway tunnel to the new side world, Medieval Town. ‚òÖ Race down the slopes and ride the halfpipe on your new snowboard ‚Äì it‚Äôs super cool!!!‚òÖ Meet special guest star, Princess Angela, and spend the winter with your favorite characters, Talking Tom, Talking Angela, Talking Hank, Talking Ben, and Talking Ginger!GET READY, GET SET, RUN!! description: Found your own Motorcycle Club in Bloody Roads, California:Chopper, Biker and dirty streets, that is what awaits you in Bloody Roads, California. Found your own Motorcycle Club (MC) and drive around, terrifying the neighborhood and get the district under your control. In Bloody Roads, California you become a merciless outlaw, who not only loves his bike but loves having power as well. Play with strategic thinking and tactic to get the best out of the game and always be one step ahead of other players to reach your goals.Of bikers and outlaws ‚Äì the story:Back then, three years ago, I was making good business, mainly firearms. A bit of extortion, a couple girls. All on a pretty good scale. In those days, I had it all! But then I got too careless and the ATF raided my crib. Luckily, they didn‚Äôt have too much evidence against me. Still, that mess brought me three years in Rikers Island. During a yard exercise, a guy tried to knife the President of the Bastards of Hell MC. Usually, of course, the first rules in the slammer are: Don‚Äôt see, don‚Äôt listen, don‚Äôt tell. And most importantly, don‚Äôt get involved. But the MC guys were honest types. I guess that was why I didn‚Äôt just turn my head. Now the Club owed me. I guess I could a joined the MC, but I preferred doing my own thing. Still, the whole appearance of these guys really impressed me. Three years later I am finally a free man again and the clink did not tame me one bit. However, it is time to start something new. Ever since I can imagine I loved living my freedom on my chopper. My bike always was more to me than just a vehicle. So founding my own motorcycle club and painting the streets red with my fellas ever since felt natural. Together we keep the streets free of those who think can mess with us. That‚Äôs what you ought to do:Just out of jail and free again but with your own district now that you can manage from underground it is your duty to start your career as a gangster anew and found your own mc club. Your goal must be to expand the Motorcycle Club (MC) and rule the district with the help of your biker friends. Earn money, expand your influence and attack and rob other players in game. But watch out! The cops got their eyes everywhere so always remember to briber them and be sure that they keep their eyes shut and stay out of your business. With fortunes and tactic you‚Äôll be the king of the road and rule them with merciless severity.In game Features:Bloody Roads, California is a strategy and building game, that asks for strategic thinking, fortunes and tactic. These are the features you get in the game and that will keep you entertained and on the edge of your seat for hours.‚Ä¢	Found your very own MC‚Ä¢	Fight against bikers from other players in merciless streetwars‚Ä¢	Get onto your chopper and built up your own empire‚Ä¢	Earn money by running tattoo studios, bars and other establishments, to expand and built up your MC‚Ä¢	Train your bikers to keep your business going.‚Ä¢	Have a blast with this multiplayer strategy game
descriptionHTML:
Found your own Motorcycle Club in Bloody Roads, California:

Chopper, Biker and dirty streets, that is what awaits you in Bloody Roads, California. Found your own Motorcycle Club (MC) and drive around, terrifying the neighborhood and get the district under your control. In Bloody Roads, California you become a merciless outlaw, who not only loves his bike but loves having power as well. Play with strategic thinking and tactic to get the best out of the game and always be one step ahead of other players to reach your goals.


Of bikers and outlaws – the story:

Back then, three years ago, I was making good business, mainly firearms. A bit of extortion, a couple girls. All on a pretty good scale. In those days, I had it all! But then I got too careless and the ATF raided my crib. Luckily, they didn’t have too much evidence against me. Still, that mess brought me three years in Rikers Island. During a yard exercise, a guy tried to knife the President of the Bastards of Hell MC. Usually, of course, the first rules in the slammer are: Don’t see, don’t listen, don’t tell. And most importantly, don’t get involved. But the MC guys were honest types. I guess that was why I didn’t just turn my head. Now the Club owed me. I guess I could a joined the MC, but I preferred doing my own thing. Still, the whole appearance of these guys really impressed me.
Three years later I am finally a free man again and the clink did not tame me one bit. However, it is time to start something new. Ever since I can imagine I loved living my freedom on my chopper. My bike always was more to me than just a vehicle. So founding my own motorcycle club and painting the streets red with my fellas ever since felt natural. Together we keep the streets free of those who think can mess with us.


That’s what you ought to do:

Just out of jail and free again but with your own district now that you can manage from underground it is your duty to start your career as a gangster anew and found your own mc club. Your goal must be to expand the Motorcycle Club (MC) and rule the district with the help of your biker friends. Earn money, expand your influence and attack and rob other players in game. But watch out! The cops got their eyes everywhere so always remember to briber them and be sure that they keep their eyes shut and stay out of your business.
With fortunes and tactic you’ll be the king of the road and rule them with merciless severity.

In game Features:

Bloody Roads, California is a strategy and building game, that asks for strategic thinking, fortunes and tactic. These are the features you get in the game and that will keep you entertained and on the edge of your seat for hours.

• Found your very own MC
• Fight against bikers from other players in merciless streetwars
• Get onto your chopper and built up your own empire
• Earn money by running tattoo studios, bars and other establishments, to expand and built up your MC
• Train your bikers to keep your business going.
• Have a blast with this multiplayer strategy game

The only thing I don't like is that when you shoot sometimes in attacker defender, the other person jumps up and blocks the ball when it's already almost to the net. Please fix this. Overall though, it is a great game.

U guys need to give me like 10 billion dollars. Every time I'm winning in the game it cuts off, it says "connecting" like seriously. Iv got the best WiFi in the world and it says connecting. Like really, iv just been loosing due to this. Fix it. Or give me 10 billion dollars in the game. I wont play it anymore if I get cut off 1 more time.

descriptionHTML:
Ad free version of Wordfeud with statistics.

Play against 30 million opponents!

Wordfeud is a multiplayer puzzle game where you can challenge friends and random opponents and play in up to 30 separate games simultaneously!

Create and place words on the 15 by 15 tile board and earn points for creativity and placing letters on the high scoring Double Letter, Double Word, Triple Letter and Triple Word tiles.

Search for friends to play against or allow Wordfeud to match you up with an opponent. Even chat with them - smack talk or praise - it's your choice!

Tired of the same standard board each game? Choose the option to randomize the board and change up where the DL, TL, DW, TW tiles are placed - giving the classic game a new twist!

Features:
- Choose to play with friends or be matched up against random opponents
- Play in 30 simultaneous games!
- Random board option to mix up the DL, DW, TL, TW tiles
- Push notifications informing you of opponent's latest move
- Uses English, German, Spanish, Portuguese, French, Dutch, Norwegian, Swedish, Danish and Finnish dictionaries
- Chat with your opponents

For more information on Wordfeud, visit us at Wordfeud.com and follow on Twitter @wordfeud. Also check out the Facebook fan page at http://www.facebook.com/WordfeudGame

comments: I do like the game because it is fun.  The graphics are excellent, the gameplay is challenging; however, the new update includes an option to purchase updates to units by way of credits, alloy, and crystals.  The wording is not specific and I wasted quite a bit of crystals, credits and alloy and did not receive what I thought I purchased.  Although I am unhappy and will most likely NOT make any further purchases in this game in the future, it is still worth a try.  Just make sure you do not make the same mistake I did.  I do hope the developer reads this and makes the appropriate chsnges.  Enjoy.

Loved it to begin with and spent a lot of actual money to progress...... but it only helped a little, you have to have deep pockets or too much time to get anywhere. Oh and now it's crashed, having to re install just to see if I've lost all my money!

The competitive balance in this game is garbage. Unless you spend real money and play constantly, you have no chance in this game. Constantly getting attacked by players levels ahead of you no fun. I'm a lvl 8, and to have opponents only need 2 shots to destroy any of my defenses is asinine. Especially for the amount of time and ore it takes to level up. Do not waste your time on this game!

I gave 2 stars.  I used to like this game but not anymore. I am lvl 7 and the only people who ever hit me are lvl 10 bases!!! What is up with that? Don't give me some bs excuse is because regardless, this is not right and I am thinking of quitting because of this.  I'm a paying customer but I won't be spending another dime on this lopsided game.  Thanks for stealing my cash and my time.

Would definitely give at least 4 stars, but there's one thing that really makes me mad: The Attacking/Defending Algorithm. Out my entire squad, I have the least attacks, but I'm the leader, by far, in defenses. I don't WANT to attack anyone yet. I want to farm and get stronger. But I can't do that if I'm getting attacked 7-10 times every hour. Even when I win defenses, I still lose resources. Fix that. Make it to where people that rarely attack, are rarely attacked.

this game used to be good but they have ruined the opponents. being a level 9 on all  units costs more to build to attack than the resources you can scavenge from your opponents. also the developers are allowing hundreds of absolutely identical bases to be produced so even if you decline an attack and are repaired you get matched to a different 'player' but with the same base. it's a disgrace.

descriptionHTML:
Fight for Your Side. Command The Galaxy.

The Galactic War rages on. Where does your allegiance lie? Will you side with the Rebellion or the Empire? Join the fight, build your base, recruit and train your army, strategically plan your defenses, and lead your troops to victory on war-torn worlds throughout the galaxy!

Battle with or against iconic characters like Darth Vader, Luke Skywalker, Han Solo, and Princess Leia, and utilize or destroy units like AT-ATs, Speeder Bikes, Wookiee Warriors, and Stormtroopers. Join millions around the globe to play in this epic combat strategy game. Commander, the fate of the galaxy is in your hands!

FEATURES

• CHOOSE to fight for the Rebellion or the Empire
• TRAIN your troops to charge into battle
• BUILD units and vehicles with multiple upgrades
• DEFEND your base against enemy forces
• COMPLETE original story missions and gain additional rewards
• LEVEL UP your heroes, troops, vehicles, and more
• BATTLE on different worlds within the Star Wars™ universe
• TEAM UP WITH FRIENDS and allies to form the ultimate squad

Upgrade your Planetary Command building to scout and relocate your base to new worlds such as Dandoran, Yavin 4, Er’Kit and Hoth to expand your command and strengthen your squad.

Star Wars: Commander requires Android OS 4.0 or above and supports both tablets and phones.

Before you download this experience, please consider that this app contains:
• Social media links to connect with others
• In-app purchases that cost real money, push notifications to let you know when we have exciting updates like new content
• Advertising for some third parties, including the option to watch ads for rewards
• Advertising for The Walt Disney Family of Companies

We respect your wishes regarding your Privacy. You can exercise control and choice by resetting your Advertising Identifier in your device’s Privacy Settings. This app allows access to your Google Play Account. You can upload and save content from this app to your device.

Visit the official Star Wars Commander website – https://www.starwarscommander.com/

Privacy Policy – http://disneyprivacycenter.com
Terms of Use – http://disneytermsofuse.com

Even to just furnish your home. I hope kim and Glu reconsider this as not everyone has money to splash on what you need to progress more quickly.

I've spent probably thousands on this game because I liked it, but I'm having serious problems. Back on March 13Th I bought yet another hundred dollar kstar pack that did not go through. I was able to confirm the order and they "added it to my account". The problem is I still haven't gotten it. And I've sent screenshots showing I have not gotten it. I've purchased several other packs of various prices and I've received them all, but I've still, to this day, not received the hundred dollar one. I keep getting bounced around and told "just do a hard reset" which I've already done several times as well as turning off my phone and everything. That doesn't explain why I've gotten the other purchases but not this one. On top of that, the "help" I've been getting has been taking longer and longer to even respond, each time though I'm getting the same unhelpful answers.  If it was five dollars I would have just forgotten it, but I'm being screwed out of 100 dollars with no answers. I'm extremely disappointed.  Buyers beware.

descriptionHTML:
Dreamsky Games, Just be Happy!

"Zombie Avengers-Stickman War Z" is one of the best action side-scrollers in 2016! With grand stages, flashy skills, stylish equipment, explosive combat, the game is a perfect combination of Stickman and zombies that takes players into the future, where the world is overwhelmed by zombies, to save the humanity!

background story:
It is A.D. 2050. The extremists' biological weapon research led to a chemical leakage that infected most humans and turned them into zombies. Social order disintegration and tragic events contributed to the demise of most of humanity. A small portion of the infected gained supernatural powers due to genetic mutations, and they formed an alliance to combat the zombie apocalypse. A war to save humanity has started...

Features:

[Best Action Game of the Year]
The most anticipated action game of 2016. You can experience the thrilling sensation with features like Double-Hits, Levitation and Deadly Combos! Come feel the heat and slay some monsters!

[Heroes Joining Forces]
More heroes unlocked and more heroes to team up with! Join forces with others to fight the Monster King BOSS! Choose your own team now and start fighting!

[Classic Stickman Hero]
The many types of Stickman Heroes, such as melee fighters or long-range attackers, will give you the best combat experience!

[Best Visual Experience]
High-quality graphics! Stunning special effects! League of Stickman - Zombie present you the best gaming experience!

[Simple & Smooth Operation]
Freely switch between heroes and master their four different skills. You will have the best combat experience you ever had!

[World Leaderboards]
We offer world leaderboard, country leaderboard and friend leaderboard. Your team can compete with players around the world. Beat all others and be the Champion!

comments: Really fun at fisrt, but after a month or two of playing planet shields become way to strong. Even with the dark matter bonuses and increased infectivity from your bacteria slots it takes too many attacks and nanos. The game desprately needs a way to penetrate shields, or reduce shield strength.

One of the best idle clickers out there, excellent progression and upgrade systems, lots of extra features that keep you playing. I played daily for about 60 days in a row. Got bored after the 3nd black hole for some reason.
How does one get the achievement No Time To Lose?  And, please fix the scrolling.  Whenever I scroll any list, it snaps back again. EDIT: The best I've seen of its kind.

The game is a decent enough time waster. However, when you begin getting into higher numbers the game breaks. I have over 100x the required about of bacteria to destroy a planet but it still says i can only take out 99.48%.  I have currently 75.528 oo bacteria and the planet Esloytis says it requires 47.310 nn bacteria to complete, but im at 99.7%. The numbers being dealt with are literally astronomical and unfathomable as a human, but following the progression of the game so far it would seem i have fathoms more bacteria than should be required.

I am not really happy with the new update... The colony prices have been increased... Now it would take even more time to collect the amount of bacteria needed to destroy a planet... Please change it back to its old colony costs... Overall, the game is awesome...

Good game, but $3.79 a month to remove ads? Most games have a one time payment to remove ads and it's usually less than that. Only $13 a month for World of Warcraft. There's SLIGHTLY better value for your dollar there.

descriptionHTML:
Welcome, Doctor! We've been waiting for you. Everything is prepared for you to take over and start cultivating bacteria to initiate BACTERIAL TAKEOVER!

We will start by taking over the smallest planets and move on to more difficult ones with a larger population and stronger infection resistance. We will need billions, trillions, quadrillion and even more bacteria to attack these planets. Which means your expertise in expanding and upgrading our bacterial colonies will be irreplaceable!

Build colonies, buy upgrades and generate bacteria on your own till you have enough to destroy planets and discover new powerful mutations! Remember that Plague is caused by the bacteria and it is our strength.

Bacterial Takeover is a mobile clicker and also idle game which allows you to become an evil genius that is set out to use biological weapons to destroy the whole Universe.

Main Features

- Explore universe and Destroy Planets
- Produce Nanobots and Bacteria
- Research Black Holes and Planets
- Evolve, Irradiate, and Mutate new Bacteria, overcome bacterial resistance
- Choose your Playstyle, a Tapping (clicking) or Idling
- Hoard Minerals, Gene Strands, Dark Matter and much more…

Join the community
https://www.facebook.com/bacterialTakeover/

Learn more
http://wiki.bacterialtakeover.com

comments: No point in being able to have a ton of ppl on your friends list if you can't send more then 5 gifts. Should be able to at least send to all. 148 floors before u can rebirth? Too much a pain in the ass when you get stuck on a floor cause you can't beat the boss with current gear but you need to advance to get better gear.

Wow.. I though it an RPG game.. Well ur role is to create an account and that's it... All auto, game play (if any) is rushed..no time to savor the game.. what so ever.. U keep getting full bags.. When u try organizing, it full again in before u finish...and much more.. In my opinion.. It's not a really a game..  well just money sucker maybe.. (Just my opinion).

Picked this game up because it looked kind of like Nonstop Knight, and I liked Nonstop Knight. Unfortunately, it's not LIKE Nonstop Knight, it IS Nonstop Knight. It's a lazy reskin of the same game with more micro transactions bolted on.  Don't waste your time. Nonstop Knight is more fun and it won't do everything in its power to drain your bank account.

Stay away from this game all it does is rollback after you do stuff in game it's so great to get to lvl50 3 days in row to just be knocked back to lvl47 3 plus times a day.  They steal items gained, don't bother to reset attempts, just waste of time.

The gms in this game care nothing for their players. There was a "rollback" bug that liked to remember everything you spent, but not any of the rewards or achievements you recieved. After losing over 4k gems, multiple pieces of advanced gear, a very rare talent, countless forge points, and even a rare pet, they decide to give everyone 1000 gems as a "shut up, take this even though we know you lost so much, but we aren't doing anything else to keep our players" as a reply pretty much.  The game it's way to buggy and full of support that just doesn't care about their players are all. I would never suggest playing this game to anyone.

As promised here's my edit. The latest update seemed to resolve the issue, at least for me. Although I see in chat others are still having the issue so hopefully this will get resolved for good. Thank you for your speedy service.

comments: It's okay. The graphics are endearing. Controls and gameplay are smooth and easy to understand. A freemium game to be sure. It openly offers over-priced items like they are a great deal (they aren't). Most of it's purchase items are more expensive than other games. It has a gem subscription but for only 10 days, most simular games offer it for the full month for the same price, while offering more gems.

OMG THIS IS AWESOME PEOPLE DON'T KNOW WHAT THEY ARE MISSING THE GRAPHICS AND CONTROLS AND EVERYTHING ABOUT IT IS GREAT!!!!!! Except for the part when you raid somebody and the opponent's team always kills you before you kill them. ANYWAYS IT'S STILL THE BEST keep the updates coming IT IS SO FUN DESPITE NOBODY I KNOW EXCEPT FOR MY FAMILY EVEN KNOWS IT EXISTS GREATEST GAME EVEEEERRRRRR!!!

Multitude of heroes to make your team. Not stingy about giving the player stuff. Potential fun for all, as casual game. Has PvP elements. Energy bar system replenishes when level up and even progresses in size as you advance. Should not be an issue until you get farther in, random energy gains also occur on maps with a little luck. Short tutorial at game beginning is torture to endure but is over in under 5 min. Great free game!

Love the game so far. You could say I'm a try hard because I've only been playing the game for a month and a week and I'm already level 52. With 100% win rate and 83% defense rate  have one of the best teams in the game. And like I said before love it so far but for the next update. You'll should add friendly battles. Such as battling with your friends, clan mates, random players. Etc.

Pretty fun game but I had an issue happy pretty quickly into the game and I'm hoping devs see this and help out.  I bought ten common portals for the 100k gold, after opening the first one the game decided to crash and I am no longer able to redeem my 9 other chest. I change to 5 star if we can this resolved. Thanks

Hi, I don't know if it is a hack or what BUT even if my defenders WON then still it minus my POINTS and it shows that I LOST? Whereas the replay is different. And morover Aria's sand in eyes should also provoke the target. And legendary heroes are sometimes not getting worth. They need Interesting passives. Thx. Plz reply üòò

descriptionHTML:
Battle to be the Boss in this turn based, strategy RPG! Collect and build teams of powerful fantasy heroes, upgrade their unique abilities to battle epic bosses, and defend your Dungeon from raids!

FEATURES:
• NEW! Fight with your Guild to conquer even bigger event challenges!
• Summon a horde of goblin warriors, ninja assassins, majestic knights, and mythical beasts.
• Collect & upgrade fantastic heroes and build custom teams to guard your Dungeon.
• Raid the dungeons of your friends and foes to steal their gold in battles. Get sweet Revenge against other players who attack your dungeon!
• Explore many battlegrounds and take your teams to fight in campaigns against fierce bosses.
• Summon a friend’s strongest champion in battle to get your team out of a jam and take that boss down.
• Test your skills in the Tower of Pwnage, Challenge Mode, and if you dare, Boss Mode.
• Upgrade your gear and customize abilities by crafting runes.
• Journey through a special quest to unlock each hero’s Epic ability.
• Switch up your hero’s look with unique skins.
• Reap more rewards from new Events and Quests every week!

comments: Nice game but the way they select the game players within the same "strenght" is unfair. Because they use infamy to measure your lv but at the same time you can get infamy even when you die in the first seconds of a match. In that way you are obligated to face strong enemies because your team is good enought to win the battle without you. In that case the game delievers a bad experience for the player.

Plz push an update to hide chat button during battles, while battle the screen should be much cleaner with minimum icons on screen or transparent eg weapon icon. Auto on off header which shows ship names icons etc to enjoy the game screen on mobile.  Ship score is added but how know the quality / grade /% over the other strong ships where do our ships stand on that point of the certain ship levels.   Sea texture and colour need to be more improved, i really love the water in the poke'go. The way it appers its great. Plz add weather effects lightings nights Strom snowy etc head lights to ships, Reload animations, ship colour paint jobs decals,

Could you fix the guild rivalry page. After battles when people go to check the quests etc. it does not pull up. Have to exit game and restart. Happens a lot and gets frustrating. Other than that it's a very good game
Good changes, but could you guys bring back the big ol' red BATTLE button? The new one doesn't quite evoke that same 'YAAAARRGH!' feeling of going into battle. Thanks:)

Bear with me here.  How about introducing a pulse that stuns? A yellow item, radius 5, 1 slot point and stun duration probably shorter than the Tesla stun in the respective training level.  OR!  have the fixers pulse gain the ability (training maybe) to stun enemies for like 1-2sec. Same duration as when a Tesla shield is forcefully taken down. (not so sure about the second one, but the first seems good)

I love this game and the fact that all the pictures of the game above aren't hyped up. They are the real game. The game is good and I love being able to select my weapons I'm still figuring the system out completely but it's great overall. The only thing I might ask for is a slightly better tutorial
description: Face off against real opponents and own the waves in real-time team battles ‚Äì it‚Äôs sink or win.A real-time multiplayer battle arena in your pocket. Choose a ship, slap some guns on it and take to the tides with your fleet of teammates to trounce live opponents in five-on-five contests of seafaring strategy and firepower.Mobile MOBAThe thrilling competition of a team battle arena right on your mobile device. Join a fleet of allies and take on competitors the world over in bite-sized battles among the rolling waves ‚Äì all while you wait for the bus. Choose A ShipChoose between different classes of ships, each with their own speciality ‚Äì the Enforcer packs a powerful offensive punch, the Defender is a nearly indestructible floating tank, the Shooter can equip more weapons than you will ever need, the Speeder is‚Ä¶ speedy, and the Fixer keeps your teammates floating. Level up your ships for more healing, defense, speed, and firepower!Weapons, Armor, Items, AbilitiesCannons, torpedoes, grenades ‚Äì Collect, fuse and modify items to almost infinite variations. Choose from an arsenal of destructive or defensive items to fit your fighting style. Whatever it takes to keep you and your team stay afloat.Get StrategicAttack your enemies with a full on offensive assault, or play defense and capture the point. With different classes of ships to choose ‚Äì each with their own unique abilities, and a motherload of weapons, armor, items, and perks, there is plenty of room for a wide range of battle strategies.Join a GuildTeam up with your friends in a guild and chat with your guildmates while you send your opponents to the depths. Guild leaderboards pit your crew against other bands of blast-happy captains. Who will rise to the top?Terms of Use: http://www.rovio.com/eulaPrivacy Policy: http://www.rovio.com/privacyThis game may include: - Direct links to social networking websites that are intended for an audience over the age of 13. - Direct links to the internet that can take players away from the game with the potential to browse any web page. - Advertising of Rovio products and also products from select partners.- The option to make in-app purchases. The bill payer should always be consulted beforehand.- This application may require internet connectivity and subsequent data transfer charges may apply. After the initial download, additional content will be downloaded and this may include data charges.
descriptionHTML:
Face off against real opponents and own the waves in real-time team battles – it’s sink or win.

A real-time multiplayer battle arena in your pocket. Choose a ship, slap some guns on it and take to the tides with your fleet of teammates to trounce live opponents in five-on-five contests of seafaring strategy and firepower.

Mobile MOBA
The thrilling competition of a team battle arena right on your mobile device. Join a fleet of allies and take on competitors the world over in bite-sized battles among the rolling waves – all while you wait for the bus.

Choose A Ship
Choose between different classes of ships, each with their own speciality – the Enforcer packs a powerful offensive punch, the Defender is a nearly indestructible floating tank, the Shooter can equip more weapons than you will ever need, the Speeder is… speedy, and the Fixer keeps your teammates floating. Level up your ships for more healing, defense, speed, and firepower!

Weapons, Armor, Items, Abilities
Cannons, torpedoes, grenades – Collect, fuse and modify items to almost infinite variations. Choose from an arsenal of destructive or defensive items to fit your fighting style. Whatever it takes to keep you and your team stay afloat.

Get Strategic
Attack your enemies with a full on offensive assault, or play defense and capture the point. With different classes of ships to choose – each with their own unique abilities, and a motherload of weapons, armor, items, and perks, there is plenty of room for a wide range of battle strategies.

Join a Guild
Team up with your friends in a guild and chat with your guildmates while you send your opponents to the depths. Guild leaderboards pit your crew against other bands of blast-happy captains. Who will rise to the top?

comments: Love  the game, prefer it over other  similar  games  ie..candy crush. This is better by far. Some  levels  are very challenging. My only complaint  is  when you  spin the wheel 99% of the time  you get coins..no wheel barrels or anything helpful. Still love it though!

Fun game. It will give you a pass to the next level when stuck in a day or so, unlike Candy Crushtration. Whatever you do, do NOT log into Facebook to get free stars. It renders the game unplayable due to constant log in prompts. It cuts your play off mid-move causing you to uninstall out of sheer maddening frustration.

If you love games like Farmville and Candy Crush Saga then you will love this game. Not only is the game a matching game it also has a farming twist in it. You get to take care of animals as well. Also I have only seen 1 ad so far and I'm on level 15.

This game isn't bad at all except for the fact that certain parts require internet connection, and still doesn't work properly when connected to wi-fi. Also it has a horrible glitch problem, I've had to force close the app numerous times. I'm over it.

Match 3 games are my favorite types of mobile games and this one is an exceptional one because it stands out from the others with it's gameplay and visuals. Like I already said, match 3 type games are my favorite kind and  this is one of the better ones that I play. The only problem I really have is that it likes to freeze up and pause on me quite often but I don't really think the game is to blame, at least not solely,l. I think it has a lot to do with the fact that I fill my devices up to the max with misc. Junk.

Love the game, in fact it's my favorite. However it freezes constantly. You lose lives..it knocks you out all the time. I have been playing this games for years and it still freezes and crashes! PLEASE FIX THE BUGS!!

comments: This is a very convenient app. All of my favorite stories are in one place. Just one issue only, I want to transfer my data to a new device & I am having trouble doing so. I have managed to successfully transfer all my old data to this new app before, but I would like to transfer my new & existing data to another device. I have registered & followed all of the instructions to the tee on the transfer form & it always says "could not transfer data" . Also there is no fill space on the form that prompts to fill in  'Support ID'. I hope this gets looked into.

I find this app very convenient and like it a lot. But there are a few small bugs(eg. BMP's scene transition fx) and if possible, I hope the data on device can be stored in the SD card as it's taking up quite a lot of space. Thank you very much for the hard work and improving the app all the time, Voltage. ^^

I have no problem anything except the roulette. I hope Voltage will change the value of coins from 5 to 10(bronze), 10 to 50 (silver) and 100 (gold) remains the same.  It requires unfathomable patience for how many days just to get the whole story. One chapter for 100 coins, I'm fine with it if it has only 5 chapters but aside from too many chapters it has also separated sequels and epilogues. *cries*  Please reconsider changing the amount of coins. Hopes for better system and greater stories.

Loved it,even though at the beginning,i 'm a bit skeptical about it, it is kinda efficient in some way.but i do miss the standlone apps.also the login bonus is quite dissapointing,like we only get 5-10? At least give us a bit of generous amount like 10-20 coins

For anyone looking for an MC who isn't a pushover, try the newer stories. Our Private Homeroom stands out as unusually well-localized, to the point it feels like someone studied the English speaking hemisphere of the Internet for modern slang. I very much appreciate the upgrade in sass and backbone, so it was pretty well done nonetheless. I've been a monthly subscriber for months with no intention to change this.

Prices aren't competitive with paperback books. Why spend $4 per chapter when I can buy a 400 paged book new for $8. Also, the daily login bonus gives 5-10 coins per day; it would take months to unlock a single chapter at that rate. The only thing thia app has going for it is the free story every 2 weeks. üôèüôèüôè I suggest making this work more like Voltage's Lovestruck app & also letting us watch adds in exchange for coins.

comments: Very good game. Always enjoy football mangers games this is the best 1 on play store. Problem I'm having is save the game left for a few hour came bk tried to load the save game won't let me sez coropt files or files r to big 2 load on my phone and I have a Samsung s8 sort this and I will b great again

Fix fix fix fix it all isues guy's that year the game is the most bad. I play a looot of years football manager pc and android but tht year the game is not enjoyeble like the old ones. players highly paying not renew contract easy bunkrumpt from other league teams transfer windows close at 16 August so what rate I must gave?

I've been a loyal fan since FMH was created after championship manager. Love the training changes in this current version. If they can add tabloid in this version Eg Wilshere caught hanging out late at the night club after the defeat. That would greatly improve this game. Thanks

Update broke transfers. Now players on free market won't accept contracts even when you exceed their expectations for wage. Why does fmm 2018 break something after every update. Fmm2017 was really enjoyable this is not.

Im sad man i lost all my data for my hamburg career aand it seems my data was all lost!!!and i must redwonload additional data super madddd plz make sure these problems would not occur to anyome agaim. Overall is a good fun game

High Wage demands are ruining the game. Been Fulham for a season...got plenty of money and looking for decent players without breaking the wage bucket! description: Football Manager Mobile goes wherever you do, so you can win anytime and anywhere with your favourite club. With compatibility across the majority of smartphones and tablets, you‚Äôll speed through the seasons in FM Mobile whilst still experiencing that authentic football experience ‚Äì with all the top players and clubs featured from around the world.  There‚Äôs a massive 17 countries to base yourself including all the big European leagues, so you‚Äôll be the boss at one of the world‚Äôs top clubs.  Transfers and tactics are completely down to you, so you‚Äôll play the transfer market and decide who plays and who warms the bench.It‚Äôs down to you to keep the players, the board and the fans happy and lead your club to victory, and who knows ‚Äì maybe one day they‚Äôll name a stadium after you! Football Manager Mobile 2018 delivers many new and improved features for this season including:TWO BRAND NEW LEAGUESYou can now try your luck in South Korea and the USA, two brand new fully licensed league additions for this season. LARGEST EVER DATABASE OF PLAYERSUp to 21,500 active players can now be loaded with custom options across leagues and nation, meaning your scouts will be busier than ever before. TACTICAL REVAMPImproved player roles, new team instructions and a fresh UI make it easier than ever to create your footballing vision and control how your team plays. UPDATED USER INTERFACEUpgrades and fine tuning make the FM Mobile UI the most intuitive of the series. IMPROVED TEAM REPORTSThere‚Äôs now far greater insight to the strengths and weaknesses of your squad and new depth charts will highlight where you might benefit from playing the transfer market. ALL-TIME BEST XI / TEAM OF THE YEARJudge how your current team stacks up against club legends with the All Time Best XI and see which of your players make it into your dream Team of the Year.THE BEST OF THE REST‚Ä¶‚Ä¢	Choose your managerial starting reputation before starting your career‚Ä¢	Improve and develop your staff with training options‚Ä¢	Badger the board for a new stadium
descriptionHTML:
Football Manager Mobile goes wherever you do, so you can win anytime and anywhere with your favourite club.

With compatibility across the majority of smartphones and tablets, you’ll speed through the seasons in FM Mobile whilst still experiencing that authentic football experience – with all the top players and clubs featured from around the world.

There’s a massive 17 countries to base yourself including all the big European leagues, so you’ll be the boss at one of the world’s top clubs.

Transfers and tactics are completely down to you, so you’ll play the transfer market and decide who plays and who warms the bench.

It’s down to you to keep the players, the board and the fans happy and lead your club to victory, and who knows – maybe one day they’ll name a stadium after you!

Football Manager Mobile 2018 delivers many new and improved features for this season including:

TWO BRAND NEW LEAGUES
You can now try your luck in South Korea and the USA, two brand new fully licensed league additions for this season.

LARGEST EVER DATABASE OF PLAYERS
Up to 21,500 active players can now be loaded with custom options across leagues and nation, meaning your scouts will be busier than ever before.

TACTICAL REVAMP
Improved player roles, new team instructions and a fresh UI make it easier than ever to create your footballing vision and control how your team plays.

UPDATED USER INTERFACE
Upgrades and fine tuning make the FM Mobile UI the most intuitive of the series.

IMPROVED TEAM REPORTS
There’s now far greater insight to the strengths and weaknesses of your squad and new depth charts will highlight where you might benefit from playing the transfer market.

ALL-TIME BEST XI / TEAM OF THE YEAR
Judge how your current team stacks up against club legends with the All Time Best XI and see which of your players make it into your dream Team of the Year.

THE BEST OF THE REST…
• Choose your managerial starting reputation before starting your career
• Improve and develop your staff with training options
• Badger the board for a new stadium

comments: Cost of everything in the game is particularly high. And gems??? Don't even get me started.  They just dropped some limited time dragons in the game, and the cost of EACH them is OVER $100 if you haven't been able to earn that many gems in game yet.  Which takes a very, very long time.  Uninstalling today, casual players beware.

Very relaxing game. I wouldn't say it's a "time killer" because after playing for hours you'd probably spend a lot of cash out of your pocket, if you don't want to pay this game calls for lots of patience. If you have PATIENCE you will NOT have to buy anything. I've been playing for almost 2 years now and I have only spent 30$ on the game and not because I felt like i had to but because I just wanted to; to speed the game play up a bit. I have gotten every dragon so far, even the event dragons, and limited time dragons, etc. Without  having to spend any gems. Sometimes it takes days of breeding the same pair but it will work if your persistent and patient! :)

Concept-wise the same as with many breeding games. It's fun, a nice game to have for here and there.  Generally good ideas were implemented into this game. Most dragon designs are really good. Unfortunately I don't understand some of the mechanics in the game like removing something from the market makes you lose this item? I mean the last time I have opened a market on the street, I kept my things I put for sale. :? Please fix those logic flaws.

It's fun enough if you don't take it too serious. I could write a long review but I was in the middle of playing when the game kept asking for a review, kind of annoying. But in all honesty this is one of two games I have consistently played for a long time now, so I really do like it.

I really love this game...i have this one and the other DragonVale. I have alot of fun with my grandkids breeding the different dragons. I will say tho that I would have given this 5 stars all the way across if it didn't take so long to get some of the dragons. We have been trying for the Knarr dragon for months and can not get it. It is very frustrating. If it wasn't for the new events that give us a chance to breed new dragons I am afraid I would have uninstalled this due to it taking wayyyyyyy to long to breed certain dragons.

I've been playing this game for a LONG time. And it continues to keep my interest! It's so fun! And with the constant release of new dragons and events, it stays fun. I wish there were more events, but Hey! It's a great game! Expand that market place though...

These fiery buddies love to roam and they need a skilled curator to help them thrive and explore. Build habitats, farm plots, and other creature comforts to make your dragon sanctuary a paradise. More dragons will fly in as they see your experience grow. It‚Äôs up to you to discover every dragon in the land and record it in your magical Dragonarium ledger. Trade resources with other players, visit their parks, and gift gems to each other in a bustling community. descriptionHTML:
We’ve hatched an all-new DragonVale game! Enter a magical 3D world of dragon-filled adventures.

Once you start collecting, you won’t stop. These fiery buddies love to roam and they need a skilled curator to help them thrive and explore.

Build habitats, farm plots, and other creature comforts to make your dragon sanctuary a paradise. More dragons will fly in as they see your experience grow. It’s up to you to discover every dragon in the land and record it in your magical Dragonarium ledger. Trade resources with other players, visit their parks, and gift gems to each other in a bustling community.
